error.unableToLoad: Unable to load your application data. Please try again.
error.notFoundDesc: The application you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

applicationInfo.title: Application Info
applicationInfo.coSignersLabel: Are there others applying with you (including co-signers)?
applicationInfo.coSignersDesc: Please indicate if anyone else, including co-signers, is applying with you.
applicationInfo.shortPeriodLabel: Are you booking this property for a short period of time?
applicationInfo.shortPeriodDesc: Please indicate if this is a short-term booking.
applicationInfo.peopleLabel: How many people will be living in the property in total?
applicationInfo.peopleDesc: Please enter the total number of people who will reside in the property.

residentialHistory.title: Residential history
residentialHistory.desc: Please provide your current and past address information.

employment.title: Employment
employment.desc: Please provide your current and past employment information.

otherIncome.title: Other Income
otherIncome.desc: Are there other sources of income you would like to include?
otherIncome.descMore: Include any additional sources of income you would like considered (e.g., freelance, investments, etc.)
otherIncome.bankDesc: Enter the name of your current bank or financial institution.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.haveAnimal: Will you have an animal living with you at this property?
generalInfo.haveVehicle: Will you have a vehicle at this property?
generalInfo.requirement: Do you have any special requests or requirements we should be aware of?

emergencyContact.title: Other Information
emergencyContact.additionalCommentsDesc: Provide any additional information or comments that may help your application (optional).
emergencyContact.foundThrough: How did you find this property?

background.title: Background
background.evicted: Have you (or any person you have named on this application) ever been evicted from a tenancy or left owing money?
background.criminalOffense: Have you or any member of your household ever been convicted of (or pled guilty or no contest to) any criminal offense(s) other than minor infraction(s) that were disposed of by means other than acquittal or a finding of 'not guilty'?
background.bankrupted: Have you (or any person you have named on this application) ever filed for or been involved in a bankruptcy, been foreclosed on, or been a defendant in a civil suit?

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocuments.photoIdDesc: Upload a government-issued photo identification (e.g., driver's license, passport, or national ID).
uploadDocuments.proofOfIncomeDesc: Upload your most recent pay stub, bank statement, or other proof of income.
uploadDocuments.otherDocsDesc: Upload any additional documents you wish to provide (optional).

address.unknownEmail: I don't know my landlord's email

saveAndFinishDialog.title: Don't miss out on this rental!
saveAndFinishDialog.description: Save your progress and finish your application later. Your information will be securely stored.

applicationSavedDialog.title: Application Saved
applicationSavedDialog.description: Your application has been saved successfully. You can return and complete it at any time.
